channel.title: Useful Blogs For Developers
channel.description: Recent content on Useful Blogs For Developers

item.title: PHP Frameworks
item.description: In this blog, I am going to compare two major frameworks of PHP. I will discuss their features, similarities and differences that will help you to decide which one can be the best according to your requirements. This blog post describe the features of both symfony and laravel PHP frameworks. PHP PHP is the most popular programming language in era of development. It is a Server-side language and Release of PHP 7 made this more better and stable.

item.title: Javascript
item.description: In this blog post, I will go over the new features of Java Script. I will make a special emphasis on how these features can help in the website development. This blog post provides the best knowledge to developer to learn the best things that they can do in development using javascript which will be helpful for them. New Features of javascript There are a lot of new features for programmers in javascript ES6 as compare to ES5.
